TEXT: e1: Intelligence services apparently enjoy indiscriminate liberties.
e2: No one can follow their activities in detail.
CN RELATION: following activities in detail, impossible (HasProperty)/no one, follow activities in detail (CapableOf)

TEXT: e3: Of course a certain level of secrecy is the basis for the work of intelligence services.
e4: The unregulated work of the secret services, however, carries the danger of misuse of their authority.

TEXT: e5: That's why intelligence services must be regulated in the framework of parliamentary oversight committees.
